name: An EPIC 5-disc FF6 Fan Album from OC ReMix... Take Two!
blurb: An AMAZINGLY EPIC, unofficial fan arrangement album inspired by Final Fantasy 6, from OC ReMix! 5 Discs of awesome! We're BACK!

rewards.reward: THANK YOU for rocking! \\m/ And, check it out, we've got over 2,300 OC ReMixes & more than 30 albums free for you! FOREVER! :-) @ http://ocremix.org

Contributors get a digital download code for the AMAZING album, IMPOSTOR NOSTALGIA by Mass Effect 2 composer Big Giant Circles (Jimmy Hinson)!! Plus the WARM FUZZY FEELINGS of knowing they helped OC ReMix! Jimmy's the one who started our very first fundraiser years ago, and he's donating download codes for his own album to help our first Kickstarter! We love him, and you should too!

SNEAK PEAK! Get download access to the first disc of our FF6 album TWO WEEKS BEFORE IT'S RELEASED! Plus contributors get download codes for THREE ALBUMS - BGC's IMPOSTOR NOSTALGIA, zircon's ANTIGRAVITY, and Danny B's SUPER MEAT BOY DIGITAL SPECIAL EDITION SOUNDTRACK! Plus a SUPPORTER CREDIT on the official FF6: Balance and Ruin website!

Get a FIVE-DISC, LIMITED EDITION PHYSICAL COPY of the album! We're going all out to make sure this is not only some amazing music, but a gorgeous overall package with beautiful art & liner notes! We're only gonna print 2,000 of 'em... this is the single best opportunity yet to support OC ReMix, support the album & get something amazing in return! Plus you get all the awards from the $25 category - 3 great digital albums & early access! (SHIPPING ALREADY INCLUDED for absolutely anywhere in the world!)

SONIC DASH! Get the five-disc FF6: BALANCE AND RUIN physical PLUS a physical copy of our previous album, SONIC THE HEDGEHOG: THE SOUND OF SPEED! Plus five OC ReMix bonus stickers, PLUS all the other prizes from the $25 category!

Get not one but TWO physical copies of FF6: BALANCE & RUIN - signed by director Andrew "zircon" Aversa!! What will you do with the second copy? Wear it as a hat? Keep it in a vault? Woo a significant other? So many options! Plus you'll not only get a physical copy of THE SOUND OF SPEED but also a 2-DISC physical copy of DONKEY KONG COUNTRY 2: SERIOUS MONKEY BUSINESS - signed by djpretzel! We've got very few of these left! Plus five bumper stickers & all the prizes from the $25 category! Plus you'll get an ASSOCIATE PRODUCER CREDIT on the album website AND the liner notes for the FF6 physical!

REMIX REQUEST!! Pick any song from any game, and we'll REMIX IT! We can't specify which artist(s) will fill the request, but you CAN specify genre, and staff will supervise to ensure your custom mix is up to OCR standards! PLUS all of the prizes from the $250 category AND a bonus physical copy of NiGHTS: LUCID DREAMING signed by album director Level 99!

SPONSOR CREDIT: Get your NAME/ICON/URL on the FF6 album homepage, plus your name on the album liner notes AND the BACK COVER! In addition to all the prizes from the $500 category, sponsors also get TEN BONUS COPIES of FF6 plus a physical copy of FF4: ECHOES OF BETRAYAL, LIGHT OF REDEMPTION (less than 30 left, total!) and THE ANSWER (Armored Core)! Sponsors also get BACKSTAGE PASS access to FF6: BALANCE AND RUIN - which includes participation in several Skype chats discussing album progress, access to exclusive work-in-progress/drafts of select tracks, and more! If you want, we'll also make a separate tweet/announcement that you (or your organization) officially sponsored the album!

GOT A GAME? LET US DO THE SOUNDTRACK!! Contributors will receive an original soundtrack (<=60 min. of music) for their game or other project, created by the OC ReMix community and coordinated by OCR staff to ensure quality! Wanna make sure your game's soundtrack does it justice? Need amazing, versatile composers & arrangers at your command? OC ReMixers have contributed to AAA titles like Mass Effect 2, Soulcalibur V, Star Wars: The Old Republic, Super Meat Boy, and more, and the 2,300+ ReMixes on ocremix.org should give you some idea what you're in for!! This reward does not include prizes from the lower categories, but it won't matter when you're basking in the glory of your own CUSTOM SOUNDTRACK!
